Defines two functions that print messages indicating their creation and modification status.

# Purpose
This code is a simple script that demonstrates basic print functionality in Python. It includes a top-level print statement that outputs the message 'this is a new python file, cool'. Additionally, it defines two functions: [`new_func`](<#new_func>) and [`new_func_3`](<#new_func_3>). The [`new_func`](<#new_func>) function prints the message 'this is a new func', while the [`new_func_3`](<#new_func_3>) function prints 'deleted new_func_2, but now have new_func_3'. The script serves as a basic example of defining and using functions in Python.
